title: Equip Value
content:
A value, ranging from 0 to 5, displayed as a series of filled-in squares at the lower right of the title bar of certain gear and attachment Ranger cards. If you ever have more than five squares of equip value worth of cards in your player area, you must discard cards from your player area until five or fewer squares remain.

  • At the beginning or end of any Ranger's turn, you can choose to discard any number of equipped cards that you no longer want.
